pkgmetadata.longdescription: Interactive 'shiny' Dashboard for 'nlmixr2' // An R shiny user interface for the 'nlmixr2' (Fidler et al (2019) doi:10.1002/psp4.12445) package, designed to simplify the modeling process for users. Additionally, this package includes supplementary functions to further enhances the usage of 'nlmixr2'.
